entity.name: Game of Thrones
entity.description: George R.R. Martin's best-selling book series `A Song of Ice and Fire' is brought to the screen as HBO sinks its considerable storytelling teeth into the medieval fantasy epic. It's the depiction of two powerful families - kings and queens, knights and renegades, liars and honest men - playing a deadly game for control of the Seven Kingdoms of Westeros, and to sit atop the Iron Throne. Martin is credited as a co-executive producer and one of the writers for the series, which was filmed in Northern Ireland and Malta.

This is ruining our lives & that awful woman says ‚Äúthe eggy smell from chemistry class‚Äù.#stopthestink

tweets.text: @AaronBell4NUL @vuecinemas @EnvAgency It stank on Friday afternoon in town. Lots of outdoor food stalls and there's no chance if have been eating when all I could taste is landfill ü§¢ This place is ruining an already struggling town.

tweets.text:
@Tus_M_ @AaronBell4NUL @vuecinemas @EnvAgency @SimonTagg I hope that these businesses take action. They are paying business rates and tax, and now their business is being out at risk - with bi action, zero protection. 

It seems we have got so far but the absolute lack of understanding from @pow_rebecca does not help us or business.

@AaronBell4NUL @vuecinemas @EnvAgency And they just keep coming tonight, endless stream of complaints in town. If you don‚Äôt listen to us residents, you‚Äôd best believe you‚Äôll be listening to the sound of money leaving the town centre! üí∞@SimonTagg #stopthestink https://t.co/vMmX75rapy
@AaronBell4NUL @vuecinemas @EnvAgency This town is being destroyed. #StopTheStink

tweets.text: @jeremy_hume @GaryOwen55 @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids We are living in dystopia in Newcastle under Lyme where govt agencies &govt ministers sweep high levels of methane, H2S& particulate matter under the carpet to avoid panicking the public&paying for anything #stopthestink @BorisJohnson @MattHancock @HouseofCommons @pow_rebecca

tweets.text: Daily dose of poisonous hydrogen sulphide has arrived early in Hartshill-c5 miles from Walleys Landfill-today. Normally get gassed evening/night time. No chance we can go along with government COVID guidance to keep homes ventilated.  #StopTheStink @PHE_uk @EnvAgencyMids

tweets.text: The whole house stinks of landfill gas from #walleysquarry even with an air purifier, essential oils ultrasonic diffuser and 2 x 100% fragrance candles.. #stopthestink #landfill @PHE_uk @DefraGovUK @SimonTagg @EnvAgency @guardian @BBCNews @itvnews

Question - @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA
Why is the wrong health limit applied to Whalleys Quarry Landfill given that our community's health has been affected for many years. My son already has brain scaring & CP. The constant exposure to H2S is causing him headache & nose bleeds! https://t.co/Mo50j35VW5
PUBLIC STATEMENT FOR @SurreyCouncil @GuildfordBC https://t.co/ia3xaGXVFQ

Today @hs2ltd took possession of the river at Chalfont St. Giles for possible mitigation work https://t.co/oUE6J8pMxx
